backend/main.mo: Defines core types for workouts, recovery, user profiles, and exercise library, with logic placeholders and imports for authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Describes feature evidence for deploying a new draft build after backend filter fixes, listing related files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend source files for documentation or build analysis.
frontend/DEPLOY_RETRY.md: Logs deployment retry attempts and documents fixes to backend muscle-group filtering syntax.
frontend/index.html: Sets up the PWA HTML shell including meta tags, icons, splash screens, and root app mount.
frontend/public/manifest.json: Defines PWA manifest metadata such as icons, theme, display mode, and categories.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing authentication, routing, splash screen, workout generation validation, and lazy-loaded pages.
Modal for updating bodyweight with validation, unit selection, and profile update mutation.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Renders the bottom navigation bar with tabs and a settings modal, handling vibration and navigation events.
frontend/src/components/ExerciseChangeMo: Modal allowing users to select and record alternative exercises, fetching options and handling loading and errors.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the app header with branding, test mode badge, settings button, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/ProfileLoadingSc: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/PullToRefresh.ts: Implements touch-based pull‑to‑refresh behavior with custom resistance, indicators, and refresh handling.
Displays muscle recovery data with loading states, color coding, and optional weighted leg recovery calculation.
frontend/src/components/SettingsModal.ts: User settings modal for updating profile attributes, theme, and rest settings with validation and save logic.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Full‑screen splash screen showing a dumbbell icon and app title during startup.
frontend/src/components/StatusBar.tsx: Top status bar displaying the user's workout streak and today's date.
frontend/src/components/WorkoutShareModa: React modal for sharing a workout via link, QR code, or native share, with clipboard copy and dynamic QR generation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActor.ts: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading identities, handling login/logout, and exposing auth state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with the backend, including error handling, validation, and user profile defaults.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: Implements a robust wake‑lock hook that acquires, maintains, and releases screen wake locks with auto‑reacquisition.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind‑based dark theme styles, system font settings, mobile optimizations, and UI utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/sessionStorage.ts: Provides utilities to save, load, validate, and clear workout session state in sessionStorage with 24‑hour expiration.
frontend/src/lib/timestampUtils.ts: Converts backend nanosecond timestamps to milliseconds, validates ranges, and formats them into readable dates.
Groups exercises by muscle group and builds ordered workout sections, including detailed leg subsections.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with react‑query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays workout history, recovery data, stats, and actions, with timestamp helpers and pull‑to‑refresh support.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Shows past workouts, calendar highlights, and volume/date formatting with refresh and timestamp conversion.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login screen using Internet Identity with branding, feature highlights, and a login button.
frontend/src/pages/NewWorkoutPage.tsx: UI for selecting workout type and generating workouts via query hooks, then sending results back to parent.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Form that collects user profile data and saves it using a mutation with basic validation.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressPage.tsx: Displays recovery status and weekly muscle group volume with refresh capability using query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/SharedWorkoutPage.tsx: Empty page placeholder with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/pages/WorkoutPreviewPage.ts: Validates and displays a generated workout, supports regenerating or swapping exercises before starting the session.
frontend/src/pages/WorkoutSessionPage.ts: Handles full workout session flow including set logging, timers, PR tracking, wake lock, and exercise changes.
frontend/src/types.ts: Defines frontend-only types for exercises, workouts, recovery data, volume tracking, and set configurations.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from hash-based routes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, layout, typography, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current state, issues, and a new feature request to fix Motoko filter syntax.
